tool_description: Get fundamental data for all US stocks going back up to 30 years
name: US Stock Info
title: US Stock Info

api_list.name: Get Balance Sheet
api_list.description:
This API returns the annual and annual balance sheet statements for the company of interest. Append the ticker of the company of interest along with your Rapid API key to the endpoint.

**Example:**

> https://us-stock-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getBalanceSheetData/AAPL?rapidapi-key=YOUR_RAPID_API_KEY
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-stock-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getBalanceSheetData/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-stock-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-stock-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getBalanceSheetData/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-stock-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Industry Info List
api_list.description:
Get tickers by each industry of a US exchanges. 

exchanges: NASDAQ, NYSE, AMEX, OTC

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-stock-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
